techs.name: Mountain Mining
techs.quote: 'Long have they stood proud against the tests of time, but to humans, they are nothing more than giant rocks for the harvesting' - ???

techs.name: Mass Drilling
techs.quote: 'What can we mine and excavate down below the earthly giants that used to govern our lives?' - ???

techs.name: Subterranean Mining
techs.quote: 'The resources down here are unlike any other that we could have ever imagined in quantity' - ???

techs.name: Subterranean Living
techs.quote: 'What safety and protection can the depths of the world give us?' - ???

techs.name: Advanced Mass Drilling
techs.quote: 'How much more can we harvest from the depths of these mountains' - ???

techs.name: Advaanced Subterranean Mining
techs.quote: 'What else is down here that we could mine from these rocks?' - ???

techs.name: Advanced Subterranean Construction
techs.quote: 'Together we shall bore into these mountains of rocks and carve a palace of stone' - ???

techs.name: Subterranean Civlization
techs.quote: 'We slowly migrate into the dark depths of the mountains caves, leaving the surface world to the onslaught of the inferior surface humans for we shall become a mighty civilization here in the rocks' - ???

techs.name: Deep Sea Mining
techs.quote: 'Far in the dark depths of the deep ocean lay hidden unimaginable resources ripe for the harvest' - ???

techs.name: Mineral Extraction
techs.quote: 'Far in the dark depths of the ocean are minerals that could support our growing peoples' - ???

techs.name: Refinement Methods
techs.quote: 'There must be a more effecient method in refining these precious resources' - ???

techs.name: Advanced Submersibles
techs.quote: 'War no longer presides on the surface, but now as well within the depths of the sea' - ???
